title: Login Issue
body:
Hello, i don't really know where i can post about my problem, but it's related to league of legend since i noticed it when i wanted to play

I'll try to be short, since i'm not a good english speaker

- I have issue with connecting on the game, once i login i'm stuck at "authenticating"
- When i want to play, i like try to check my ping, and i just litteraly cannot get a single , tracert doesn't work completly: it gives me only one line and both case say the  same thing
http://i.imgur.com/s1G0CRr.png

At first i thought something may have changed on my firewall (i disabled it, nothing changed) 
Then i thought it was my internet box so i made some changes for see, and went back at what it was before, nothing changed too. My brother on his own computer, with the same Network, play without any trouble , and can get his ping or do the cmd tracert.

I really don't know what can i do, i can browse around the web but cannot play as initially wanted, and i have no idea how resolve this problem

replies.body:
It's hard to tell where you are pinging to, but you'll want to specifically troubleshoot your connection to the EUW authentication server.  Adjusting your firewall settings was a good start, you can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure that.

Since your brother can play on the same network, there might be a more local issue blocking you from reaching us.  In this case run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities.

Hello again!

I solved the issue finally this morning!
I did a hard reboot of my box and it worked, i still don't know what was the problem that said
I'll try the guide, my bad for didn't saw it, thanks you for trying to help me :), i forgot to specify, the adress where i'm pinging is my web provider (called "free", with a box named "freebox")
